changes.summary: Fix critical login issue affecting Safari users
changes.description:
Safari users were unable to log in due to a cookie handling issue introduced in v1.1.0.

## Release Note

Fixed a critical issue preventing Safari users from logging in. The problem was related to cookie handling changes introduced in the previous release.

changes.summary: Resolve memory leak in real-time collaboration
changes.description:
The new real-time collaboration feature was causing memory leaks during extended sessions.

## Release Note

Fixed a memory leak in the real-time collaboration feature that could cause performance degradation during long editing sessions.

Advanced search filters were not properly resetting when clearing search terms.

## Release Note

Fixed an issue where advanced search filters would not reset properly when clearing search terms, causing unexpected search results.

changes.summary: Improve error messages for OAuth2 setup
changes.description:
OAuth2 configuration errors were showing cryptic messages that were hard for users to understand.

## Release Note

Improved error messages during OAuth2 setup to provide clearer guidance when configuration issues are encountered.

changes.summary: Add loading indicators for AI suggestions
changes.description:
Users couldn't tell when AI suggestions were being generated, leading to confusion.

## Release Note

Added loading indicators for AI-powered suggestions to provide better feedback when suggestions are being generated.
